data.title: When did Daniel Craig and Rachel Weisz get married and how long have they been together?
data.meta_description: BRITISH actress Rachel Weisz has been happily married to James Bond actor Daniel Craig since their secret New York wedding in June 2011.Weisz has earn
data.text:
BRITISH actress Rachel Weisz has been happily married to James Bond actor Daniel Craig since their secret New York wedding in June 2011.

Weisz has earned several accolades during her nearly 20-year film career, including an Academy Award, a Golden Globe, and a British Academy Film Award.

Who is Daniel Craig's wife Rachel Weisz?

Rachel Weisz, 51, is a British-American actress best known for her roles in Death Machine, The Lovely Bones, and The Mummy series.

In addition to her on-screen performances, she occasionally models and was named a global ambassador for L'Or√©al in 2010.

Before marrying Craig, whom she had a close friendship with for years, she dated filmmaker Darren Aronofsky in 2001.

The couple became engaged in 2005 and had a son, Henry, in 2006.

In November of 2010, Weisz and Aronofsky announced they had been living apart for several months but were committed to co-parenting their son.

Weisz and Daniel Craig decided to take their longtime friendship to the next level in December in 2010 and started a romantic relationship.

When did Daniel Craig and Rachel Weisz get married?

The Dream House co-stars married in June 2011, in a small intimate ceremony in New York City.

In September of 2018, it was revealed that Weisz had given birth to their first child, a daughter.

Has Daniel Craig been married before?

Craig has previously been married to actress Fiona Loudon.

The couple wed in 1992 and had a daughter named Ella before divorcing in 1994.

Craig then became involved with German actress Heike Makatsch as the two were together for seven years before calling it quits in 2004.

Prior to dating Weisz, he was engaged to film producer Satsuki Mitchell from 2005 until 2010.

How many James Bond movies has he been in?

Craig was cast as James Bond in 2005 as he replaced Pierce Brosnan.

So far, he has been in five Bond movies: Casino Royale, Quantum Of Solace, Skyfall, Spectre and No Time to Die.

When is No Time to Die coming out?

The latest 007 movie, No Time to Die was released on October 8, 2021.

Craig starred as James Bond for one last time.
